metadata.title: Lenovo Stockpiling PC Memory Due to ‘Unprecedented’ AI Squeeze
metadata.description: Lenovo Group Ltd. is stockpiling memory and other critical components to navigate a supply crunch brought on by the boom in artificial intelligence.
metadata.keywords: LENOVO GROUP LTD,Artificial Intelligence,Winston Shao-Min,Chief Financial Officer,Hardware,SEMICONDUCTOR MANUFACTURI-H,Smartphone,XIAOMI CORP-CLASS B,C-suite,Utilities,technology
